div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1762 Tigris River, c. 65 km. below Ctesi- (1109) phon, before 1816 Burial: c. 250 B.C.? (M) Contents: 20+ AR. Pot hoard with AR ingots Getas, king of the Edoni: 2 octadr. Alexander III? Athens: 4 tetradr. Corinth Cius: 1 tetrob. Samos Lycia: 1 st. (Uälä) Antiochus I or II? Byblus Sidon: 2 double-shekels; 1 shekel Tyre: 7 shekels Unc. mints: 3 Disposition: London 6+ Jenkins, BMQ 1964, pp. 89-92, illus. The greater part of hd. was melted down
